info.title: Linkify TalkHub API
info.description: SIP bridge REST API â€” connects AI telephony platforms with German SIP providers.

get.description: Return FreeSWITCH profiles, gateways, and registrations.
Return currently active calls and channel count.
Return SIP gateway registration status from FreeSWITCH.
Return all currently registered SIP endpoints.
Return all password-based SIP users (passwords stripped).

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users Get

post.description: Create a new SIP user with username, password, and extension.

get.description: Get a single SIP user by username.

put.description: Update password, extension, or enabled status.

delete.description: Delete a SIP user by username.

get.description: Return all IP-based ACL users (for VAPI, Retell, etc.).

schema.title: Response List Acl Users Api V1 Acl Users Get

post.description: Create a new IP-based ACL user for AI platform integration.

put.description: Update IP, extension, caller ID, or enabled status.

get.description: Return all configured SIP provider gateways.

schema.title: Response List Gateways Api V1 Gateways Get

post.description: Add a new SIP provider gateway (Placetel, Easybell, Sipgate, etc.).

get.description: Get a single gateway by name.

put.description: Update gateway host, port, credentials, or enabled status.

get.description: Return inbound, outbound, user routes, and defaults.
Return default gateway, extension, and outbound caller ID.

put.description: Set default gateway, extension, or outbound caller ID.

get.description: Return all inbound routing rules (gateway -> extension).

post.description: Map an inbound gateway to a destination extension.

put.description: Change the destination extension for an inbound gateway.

delete.description: Remove an inbound routing rule. Optionally target a specific extension.

post.description: Add pattern-based outbound routing rule (pattern -> gateway).

put.description: Update an outbound route by its index (id).

delete.description: Remove an outbound route by its index (id).

get.description: Return per-user outbound gateway assignments.

post.description: Assign a specific outbound gateway to a user.

put.description: Update a user's outbound gateway assignment.

get.description: Return blacklist, whitelist, auto-blacklist settings, and fail2ban config.
Return all blacklisted IPs.

post.description: Block an IP address. Increments count if already blacklisted.
Reset the blocked_count for a blacklisted IP.

get.description: Return all whitelisted IPs.

post.description: Whitelist an IP address.

put.description: Update comment for a whitelisted IP.

delete.description: Remove an IP from the whitelist. Cannot remove 127.0.0.1.

put.description: Enable or disable whitelist-only mode.

get.description: Return auto-blacklist configuration (thresholds, time windows).

put.description: Configure automatic IP blacklisting thresholds.

get.description: Return Fail2Ban settings and current jail status.

put.description: Configure Fail2Ban integration (threshold, jail name).

post.description: Manually ban an IP through Fail2Ban jail. Accepts {ip} in body.
Manually unban an IP from Fail2Ban jail. Accepts {ip} in body.
Block an IP in FreeSWITCH firewall and add to blacklist.

get.description: Return all system settings (domain, ports, codecs, ESL config).

put.description: Update domain, SIP ports, codecs, ESL connection, or other settings.

get.description: Return license status: trial info, active licenses, connection limits.

put.description: Add and activate a license key. Accepts 'key' or 'license_key'.

post.description: Refresh license status from license server.

get.description: Return admin profile, company, and invoice data combined.

put.description: Change the admin panel password.

get.description: Return company name, address, city, ZIP, country.

put.description: Save company details.

get.description: Return invoice/billing address details.

put.description: Save invoice/billing address.
Save UI preferences (theme mode, color theme).

get.description: Alias for GET /profile/company.

put.description: Alias for PUT /profile/company.

get.description: Alias for GET /profile/invoice.

put.description: Alias for PUT /profile/invoice.

get.description: Return recent FreeSWITCH events from the circular buffer.
Return ESL connection status, buffer stats, last error.

post.description: Execute a safe ESL API command on FreeSWITCH.
Start the background ESL event subscriber.
Stop the background ESL event subscriber.
Clear all events from the circular buffer.
Test ESL connection to a FreeSWITCH instance and return version.
Execute a safe FreeSWITCH CLI command via ESL.

get.description: Return current FreeSWITCH log level from config.

put.description: Set FreeSWITCH log level (0=CONSOLE to 7=DEBUG).

post.description: Enable or disable Sofia SIP trace for a profile.

get.description: Return detailed Sofia debug output from all profiles.

post.description: Reload FreeSWITCH XML configuration and rescan profiles.

get.description: Return the complete system configuration (all sections).
Export configuration in a format suitable for FreeSWITCH provisioning.

post.description: Import a JSON configuration. Accepts both multipart file upload and JSON body.
Reload FreeSWITCH with current configuration.

get.description: Return all phone extensions (Nebenstellen).

schema.title: Response List Extensions Api V1 Extensions Get

post.description: Add a new phone extension.

get.description: Get a single extension by number.

put.description: Update extension description or enabled status.

post.description: Start an admin session. Returns 409 if another session is active (use force=true to override).
End the current admin session.

get.description: Return CPU, memory, disk, network, and OS information.
Return recent call logs (CDRs). Placeholder â€” requires FreeSWITCH CDR integration.
Return call statistics per gateway. Placeholder â€” requires CDR data.
Return security event logs (failed auth, bans, etc.). Placeholder.
Return audit log entries with optional filtering. Placeholder â€” requires audit logging implementation.

parameters.name: category

schema.description: Filter: auth, user, gateway, route, security, config, license, system
schema.title: Category

parameters.description: Filter: auth, user, gateway, route, security, config, license, system

get.description: Return current API version, git commit, and API version prefix.
Returns ok if the API is running.
